ShortDescription.NLSCatalog: Administration of the Trusted Signature Database (TSD).

Description.NLSCatalog: The Trusted Signature Database (TSD), which resides in /etc/security/tsd/tsd.dat, is used to store critical security parameters of trusted files present on the system. A trusted file is a file that is critical from the security perspective of the system, and if compromised, can jeopardize the security of the entire system.
